hero.title: Your All-in-One Growth Toolkit, Powered by Basestack
hero.description: Basestack empowers solo developers, teams, and startups with open-source tools you can self-host for free—or choose our hassle-free hosted solution. Scalable, flexible, and designed for growth, it’s the perfect foundation for every stage of your journey.

flags.title: Feature Flags
flags.description: Instantly toggle features to streamline deployments and manage risk.

forms.title: Forms
forms.description: Collect and manage submissions effortlessly with our no-code form builder.

why.title: Why Choose Basestack?
why.description: Basestack equips you with powerful tools to build smarter, scale faster, and stay flexible. Whether you prefer open-source control or hassle-free hosting, we offer tailored solutions that streamline your workflow, so you can focus on what matters most.

open.title: Open-Source Flexibility
open.description: Host it yourself for full control, or let us take care of the hosting—your stack, your way.

scale.title: Scalable for Every Stage
scale.description: From solo developers to growing teams, Basestack scales effortlessly with your vision, no matter the size.

learning.title: No Complex Setup
learning.description: Get started instantly with intuitive tools that fit seamlessly into your existing workflow—no new frameworks or steep learning curves.

who.title: Who It's Built For
who.description: Basestack is designed for creators at every stage. Whether you're a solo developer, a growing team, or an expanding business, our tools offer flexibility and scalability to meet your needs with ease.

solo.title: Solo Developers
solo.description: Launch projects quickly with lightweight, customizable tools that grow with you.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Boost collaboration and productivity with tools that scale as your team grows.

startups.title: Startups
startups.description: Build and scale with confidence using a stack that evolves alongside your business.

enterprises.title: Enterprises
enterprises.description: Streamline complex workflows with secure, scalable solutions designed for large organizations.

how-it-works.title: How It Works
how-it-works.description: Getting started with Basestack is simple and fast. Follow these three easy steps to choose your tools, set them up your way, and start building—no hassle, just results. Whether you're a solo developer or part of a team, we've made the process seamless and adaptable to your needs.

one.title: Select Your Tools
one.description: Choose from our suite of tools like Forms, Feature Flags, and more to match the specific needs of your project. Whether you’re looking to streamline user submissions, manage feature releases, or gather user feedback, we have the right solution for you.

two.title: Set Up with Ease
two.description: Set up your tools with minimal effort. Opt for self-hosting to maintain complete control over your stack or choose our hosted solution for a simplified, hassle-free experience. The choice is yours, and both options are designed to scale with your needs.

three.title: Build and Scale
three.description: Start building right away by integrating Basestack’s tools into your existing workflow. As your project grows, you can easily expand your stack and add new tools, adapting to your evolving goals and scaling efficiently without disruption.

use-cases.title: Use Cases
use-cases.description: Discover how Basestack simplifies workflows for developers, teams, and startups. From streamlining user submissions to managing feature releases, our tools address real-world challenges efficiently and effectively.

forms.one: A small business uses Basestack Forms to collect customer inquiries and auto-reply instantly—no server setup required, saving time and effort while enhancing customer experience.
forms.two: An event organizer captures attendee sign-ups and essential files through Forms, exporting data to CSV for quick, organized event planning and seamless follow-ups.
forms.three: A researcher gathers survey responses using Basestack Forms, leveraging real-time analytics to track participation and measure responses for actionable insights.
forms.four: A marketer sets up a form to collect leads and automatically redirects submitters to a custom thank-you page, ensuring a smooth and personalized lead capture process.

flags.one: A startup deploys new features to a select group of users using Feature Flags, granting access based on specific criteria without needing to redeploy, optimizing rollouts.
flags.two: A development team confidently deploys updates, utilizing Feature Flags to disable problematic features instantly, ensuring smooth user experiences even during bug fixes.
flags.three: A product team conducts A/B testing with Feature Flags, switching between two versions of a feature to gather user feedback and determine which performs best.
flags.four: A dev team hides unfinished features during a live update with Feature Flags, keeping them invisible to users until they’re polished and ready for release.

community.title: Join the Basestack Community
community.description: Basestack is powered by collaboration. Connect with like-minded developers, contribute to our open-source projects, and be part of a growing network that’s shaping the future of tools for startups.

enterprise.caption: Basestack for Enterprise
enterprise.title: Enterprises Build Smarter with Basestack
enterprise.description: Empower your team with a dedicated, private Basestack instance. Scale effortlessly, customize authentication to fit your security needs, and accelerate development with enterprise-grade reliability.

contact.caption: Basestack for Business
contact.title: Speak with Our Sales Team
contact.description: Discover how Basestack can streamline your development workflow. Book a demo and explore a trial Enterprise account to see our scalable solutions in action.

hero.title: Unlock Precision Control with Feature Flags
hero.description: Supercharge your development process with Feature Flags. Enable faster deployments, smarter testing, and safer rollouts. Control features in real-time, reduce risks, and deliver flawless user experiences—effortlessly and confidently.

features.title: Feature Flags That Power Your Workflow
features.description: Streamline deployments, enhance flexibility, and manage releases effortlessly. Feature Flags give you complete control, enabling safe rollouts and instant rollbacks—all while maintaining smooth user experiences.

one.title: Multi-Project Management
one.description: Seamlessly manage feature releases across multiple projects and environments with ease.
one.alt: A control panel showing multiple projects and environments, with intuitive feature flag management controls.

two.title: Complete Flag Control
two.description: Simplify management with powerful monitoring and automated change tracking.
two.alt: A feature flag dashboard with clear, concise data and intuitive management controls.

three.title: Remote Configuration
three.description: Adapt features instantly with dynamic payload updates, no redeploy required.
three.alt: A configuration interface for dynamically adjusting feature flags in real-time.

card.title: Feature Flags in Action
card.description: See how Basestack Feature Flags drive efficiency, transparency, and scalability across your development process.

projects.label: Organization
projects.title: Stay Organized with Projects
projects.description: Group your feature flags by project for a streamlined workflow. This approach ensures you can easily manage flags specific to each project, simplifying tracking and updates.
projects.alt: Illustration of flags organized within a project dashboard.

history.label: Transparency
history.title: Track Every Change
history.description: View a complete history of feature flag changes, including who toggled what, when, and why. This gives you full accountability and enhances team coordination.
history.alt: History log showing detailed feature flag activity.

remote-config.label: Flexibility
remote-config.title: Adjust Settings On the Fly
remote-config.description: With remote configuration, you can update flags dynamically, making real-time adjustments without redeploying. It’s perfect for rapid changes and A/B testing.
remote-config.alt: Diagram showing remote adjustments for feature flag settings.

environments.label: Scalability
environments.title: Manage Across Environments
environments.description: Easily sync and manage flags across development, staging, and production environments. This makes testing and deployment more efficient as your project scales.
environments.alt: Visual of flags syncing across multiple environments.

security.label: Security
security.title: Protect Your Features
security.description: With advanced security features like access controls and IP blocking, your feature flags are safe from unauthorized changes, keeping your product secure and compliant.
security.alt: Shield icon representing security for feature flags.

more-features.title: Feature Flags, Full Toolkit
more-features.description: Equip your team with a complete set of tools to manage feature flags effortlessly. From toggles to multi-environment testing, Basestack Feature Flags delivers everything you need to deploy with confidence and control.

history.title: Track Flag Changes
history.description: See who toggled a flag and when, all in one view.

rollbacks.title: Instant Rollbacks
rollbacks.description: Disable features with a single click, no code changes required.

bootstrapping.title: Instant Activation
bootstrapping.description: Activate flags on page load for immediate updates.

admin.title: Manage Flag Access
admin.description: Control who can edit flags with role-based permissions.

sdks.title: SDK & API Integration
sdks.description: Easily integrate with SDKs or use our API for custom setups.

environment.title: Sync Across Environments
environment.description: Manage flags seamlessly across dev, staging, and production.

security.title: Secure Access Control
security.description: Block unwanted sources and ensure secure flag management.

sdks.title: SDKs Built for Your Stack
sdks.description: Integrate Feature Flags seamlessly with SDKs designed for your preferred languages and frameworks. Use code snippets or leverage our API for full control—customize your workflow as needed.

react.title: React & NextJS
react.description: Easily toggle features in React or NextJS apps with a lightweight SDK.

js.title: JavaScript & NodeJS
js.description: Implement Feature Flags in your JS or NodeJS project with minimal setup.

api.title: API Reference
api.description: Create custom integrations with our flexible, powerful API.

why.title: Still Unconvinced About Feature Flags?
why.description: Feature flagging allows developers to control the release and behavior of features, wrapping them in conditional statements for greater flexibility and control.

benefits.title: Unlock Flag Benefits
benefits.description: Feature flags (also known as feature toggles) enable developers to adjust system behavior dynamically, without altering the core code, making releases safer and more controlled.

implementation.title: Reduce Implementation Debt
implementation.description: Feature flags let developers toggle specific code blocks on or off, offering the flexibility to skip unfinished features or conduct gradual rollouts without rewriting code.

branching.title: Feature Flags vs. Branching
branching.description: Feature flags enhance feature branching by separating feature release management from code deployment, speeding up development and reducing merge conflicts.

banner.title: Ready to Ship Your Code with Confidence?
banner.description: Basestack Feature Flags simplifies the deployment and management of feature flags, empowering you to ship your code smoothly and securely.

hero.title: Simplify Forms, Amplify Results
hero.description: Easily capture submissions with our no-code Forms solution. Basestack Forms handles secure data collection, integrations, and processing—so you can focus on what matters most.

features.title: Explore Our Top Forms Features
features.description: Discover why Basestack Forms is the go-to solution for developers. With easy setup, customization, and security, these features make form management a breeze.

one.title: All Your Forms in One Place
one.description: Easily manage all your forms from a single, organized dashboard.
one.alt: Screenshot of the Basestack Forms dashboard with a list of created forms.

two.title: Quick Form Setup
two.description: Set up forms in minutes by simply linking to our endpoint—no complex code required.
two.alt: Illustration showing the fast setup process in Basestack Forms.

three.title: Secure Your Forms
three.description: Ensure the safety of your forms with built-in access controls and data protection tools.
three.alt: Visual of security settings applied to a form in Basestack Forms.

card.title: Forms in Action
card.description: Check out the key features that make Basestack Forms a game-changer for developers.

projects.label: Organization
projects.title: Manage Your Forms Efficiently
projects.description: Keep your forms organized by grouping them into projects for better workflow management.
projects.alt: Illustration of a dashboard displaying organized forms.

history.label: Tracking
history.title: Track Submissions & Changes
history.description: Easily monitor form submissions and track any changes with a detailed history log.
history.alt: Screenshot of form submission history and changes log.

remote-config.label: Flexibility
remote-config.title: Edit Forms on the Fly
remote-config.description: Make real-time adjustments to form settings without redeploying your app.
remote-config.alt: Diagram showing real-time changes to form settings.

environments.label: Scalability
environments.title: Test Across Multiple Environments
environments.description: Test forms across development, staging, and production environments effortlessly.
environments.alt: Visual showing forms synced across multiple environments.

security.label: Protection
security.title: Protect Your Data
security.description: Control who accesses your forms and safeguard your data with security features.
security.alt: Illustration of security measures protecting form data.

more-features.title: Centralize Your Form Management
more-features.description: Boost efficiency with a unified platform that adapts to your growing form automation needs.

inbox.title: Submissions Hub
inbox.description: Easily view, share, and organize form submissions in one place.

uploads.title: File Storage (Coming Soon)
uploads.description: Securely store and retrieve files and images submitted through forms.

responses.title: Auto-Replies (Coming Soon)
responses.description: Automatically send follow-up emails to form submitters.

redirects.title: Redirect Control
redirects.description: Direct submitters to custom success or error pages after submission.

sharing.title: Team Access (Coming Soon)
sharing.description: Share forms and submissions with team members or clients.

templates.title: Email Templates (Coming Soon)
templates.description: Create custom HTML email templates for form responses.

analytics.title: Performance Insights (Coming Soon)
analytics.description: Monitor form traffic and analyze conversion rates.

export.title: Data Downloads
export.description: Export form submissions to CSV or JSON for further analysis.

builder.title: Form Builder (Coming Soon)
builder.description: Create and customize forms easily with our intuitive builder.

spam.title: Spam Filter
spam.description: Automatically detect and block spam submissions.

guide.title: Integrate Forms Your Way
guide.description: Easily connect Basestack Forms to your projects. Whether you’re using HTML, JavaScript, or Next.js, our simple integration methods let you start in minutes.

html.title: HTML Integration
html.description: Just point your form’s action to our endpoint and begin collecting submissions.

js.title: JavaScript Integration
js.description: Add custom form logic with JavaScript—no complex setup required.

next.title: Next.js Ready
next.description: Use Fetch or Axios with plain React or Next.js to interact with our endpoint.

banner.title: Ready to Simplify Your Forms?
banner.description: Start using Basestack Forms today and build smarter, faster forms with ease. Create your free account now and take control of your form management.

why.title: Create Forms, Your Way
why.description: Basestack Forms integrates seamlessly with your existing setup, enabling efficient form creation and scaling—no need for extra frameworks, languages, or tools.

html.title: Effortless HTML Forms
html.description: Point your form’s action to our endpoint—no server-side code required.

javascript.title: Streamlined JavaScript Forms
javascript.description: Use Basestack Forms to create custom form experiences with full frontend flexibility.

api.title: Powerful Forms API
api.description: Create and customize forms directly through the Basestack API with ease.

pricing.title: Flexible Pricing for Developers & Teams
pricing.description: Choose a plan tailored to your needs—from free access for individual developers to comprehensive options for growing teams. {product} offers transparent, affordable pricing to support your projects at every stage.

info.preview-features: Also includes access to preview and beta features.

questions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
questions.description: Find answers to common questions about {product}. If you don't see what you're looking for, feel free to reach out on GitHub.

1.title: Can I chat with someone if I have more questions?
1.description: Absolutely! For further inquiries, contact us at support@basestack.co. We're here to help!

2.title: Is there a discount for annual plans?
2.description: Yes! We offer annual discounts on all plans. Contact us for more details.

3.title: Is {product} available for free?
3.description: {product} offers a free plan, ideal for solo developers or those just starting out. It’s a great way to test the waters before selecting a paid plan that suits your needs.

4.title: Can I use Basestack's tools separately, and how is pricing structured?
4.description: Yes, each tool—Feature Flags, Forms, and others—works independently, with its own pricing. You only pay for the tools you need, and you can select different plans for each, based on your specific requirements.

5.title: What’s your refund policy?
5.description: We offer a 15-day refund policy if you're not fully satisfied. After that, refunds may be considered under special circumstances. Our free tier allows you to test everything before committing, and you can cancel anytime.

6.title: Which payment provider does Basestack use?
6.description: We use Lemon Squeezy to process payments securely. They handle transactions, tax compliance, and global payment methods, so you can focus on building with our tools.

7.title: What is Basestack, and who is it for?
7.description: Basestack is a suite of open-source tools, like Forms and Feature Flags, designed for developers, teams, and startups. Whether you're working solo or scaling a business, you can self-host for free or opt for our hosted plans for added convenience.

8.title: Is Basestack really free?
8.description: Yes! Our open-source tools are free to self-host forever. You only pay if you choose our hosted plans, which offer additional convenience and support.

9.title: How do I get started with Basestack?
9.description: Getting started is easy: choose your tool, decide whether to self-host or use our hosted plans, and integrate it into your project. Our docs provide quick setup guides, or you can request a demo.

10.title: What’s the Feedback tool, and when will it be available?
10.description: Our upcoming Feedback tool will help you capture user insights and feedback, similar to platforms like Canny. Stay tuned for updates, or sign up to be notified when it launches!

11.title: How secure is Basestack?
11.description: Security is our priority. Self-hosted setups give you full control, while our hosted plans include advanced protections like request filtering and data encryption to keep your projects safe.

12.title: What kind of support do I get with Basestack?
12.description: Self-hosted users can access our community and documentation. Hosted plan users get priority support directly from our team—reach out anytime at support@basestack.com.

13.title: How does Basestack compare to competitors?
13.description: Unlike rigid platforms, Basestack offers open-source flexibility and modular pricing. Our tools, like Forms and Feature Flags, are tailored to your needs, with the option for hosted plans if desired.

14.title: How often are Basestack tools updated?
14.description: We roll out regular updates to keep our tools up to date and secure. Self-hosted users can pull updates from our repo, while hosted users automatically receive updates.

15.title: Can I use Basestack with my existing tech stack?
15.description: Absolutely! Basestack integrates with most setups. Forms work with HTML or JS, Feature Flags can be used with any codebase, and our docs provide easy integration guides.

16.title: Is there a trial for hosted plans?
16.description: Our free tier serves as your trial to explore the tools. Hosted plans don’t have a separate trial, but you can cancel within 15 days for a full refund if it’s not the right fit.

17.title: Why offer both open-source and hosted options?
17.description: Open-source gives you full control with no cost, while hosted options offer convenience, support, and easy setup. You choose the best fit for your needs.
